PageTitle: Edit PowerPoint (ppt, pptx) online | Presentation editor | ONLYOFFICE
PageDescription: ONLYOFFICE is an online presentation editor that allows you to open, create, edit and collaborate on PPT, PPTX and ODP files on laptop, Android and iOS-devices.
Header: Online presentation editor for your web app
SubHeader: Open, create and edit stunning PowerPoint presentations online
Feature1Title: Impress your audience with stunning work and projects
Feature1Desc: Express any idea using a wide selection of formatting tools, objects, and style options. ONLYOFFICE Presentation Editor works with PowerPoint presentations and can save them in PDF, PNG, JPG. PPTX, PPT, ODP, and PPSX files are also supported.
Feature2Title: Fill your slideshow with advanced content
Feature2Desc: Create clear-cut schemes and sketches with autoshapes and SmartArt graphic, add customizable charts, tables, and equations for a distinct statistics display. Make your presentation more interactive with ready-made transitions and animations. Save your time: use Slide Master, group any number of objects and apply settings in bulk.
Feature3Desc: Create your own freehand drawings on slides using a pen or highlighter, choose the desired color and line thickness.
Feature4Desc: With Presenter View mode you can add notes to highlight important parts of your speech and comfortably navigate by switching to any desired slide with one simple click.
Feature5Desc: You can guarantee nimble teamwork on slides and sketches with our collaborative features. Access, share, and co-edit in real-time, leave comments on slide elements, and chat with collaborators online without leaving the ppt editor.
Feature6Title: Use AI right in the slideshow maker
Feature6Desc: Perform tasks that involve understanding or generating natural language using any AI provider. Get accurate answers to your questions, quickly find information, generate texts, get your code built, etc. <0>right in the slides</0>.
Feature7Desc: Using built-in add-ons, enhance your presentations with videos and clip art elements, get a quick translation of any text, insert special symbols, edit images, and more.

Q1: Can I edit presentations without Internet connection?
A1: Yes, you can install and use free <0>ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors</0> to edit local presentations offline.
Q2: Does ONLYOFFICE offer native mobile apps for presentation editing?
A2: Yes, you can install free <0>Documents</0> app for iOS or Android devices to work on presentations on-the-go.
Q3: Is it possible to use ONLYOFFICE presentation editor within my app under my brand?
A3: Yes, you can integrate the presentation editor into your app. Please use <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs Developer</0>.
